extension.description: Edit Markdown files with a WYSIWYG editor powered by Tiptap

command.reopenWithTextEditor.title: Reopen with Text Editor
command.applyRequiredSettings.title: Apply Required Markdown Settings (G5)
command.exportLogs.title: Export Logs
command.toggleBold.title: Toggle Bold

command.toggleUnderline.title: Toggle Underline

command.toggleHeading2.title: Toggle Heading 2

command.toggleHeading5.title: Toggle Heading 5
command.toggleHeading6.title: Toggle Heading 6

command.toggleOrderedList.title: Toggle Ordered List
command.toggleBlockquote.title: Toggle Blockquote

command.outdentListItem.title: Outdent List Item

configuration.title: inlineMark
configuration.sync.debounceMs.descriptio: Debounce delay (ms) before sending edits to the document
configuration.sync.timeoutMs.description: Timeout (ms) for waiting for ack/nack response
configuration.sync.changeGuard.maxChange: Maximum ratio of changed content before triggering change guard
Maximum number of changed characters before triggering change guard
Maximum number of change hunks before triggering change guard
configuration.debug.enabled.description: Enable debug mode: outputs JSONL logs to _log_inlineMark/ folder next to the edited file
configuration.security.allowWorkspaceIma: Allow loading images from the workspace (trusted workspace only)
configuration.security.allowRemoteImages: Allow loading remote images via HTTPS (trusted workspace only)
configuration.security.allowInsecureRemo: Allow loading remote images via HTTP (strongly discouraged)
configuration.security.renderHtml.descri: Render HTML content (sanitized) instead of showing as raw blocks
configuration.security.confirmExternalLi: Show confirmation dialog before opening external links
configuration.webview.retainContextWhenH: Keep the webview alive when switching tabs (better UX). Turn off to potentially reduce memory usage, but the editor may re-render when you return to the tab.
